test-case.name: Pre-DC Readiness (Dual NIC) - localhost.Internal and NAT adapters exist

failure.message: Expected a value, because NAT/External network adapter 'Ethernet 2' not found! HINT: Check your network adapter names with: Get-NetAdapter Then update AllNodes.psd1: InterfaceAlias_NAT = 'YourActualAdapterName' For Hyper-V VMs, you typically need two network adapters: - Internal: Static IP for AD/DNS - NAT/External: DHCP for internet access, but got $null or empty.

test-case.description: Internal NIC has static IPv4 (Manual prefix origin)
test-case.name: Pre-DC Readiness (Dual NIC) - localhost.Internal NIC has static IPv4 (Manual prefix origin)

failure.message: Expected 'Manual', because Internal NIC has DHCP instead of static IP! Current: Dhcp Required: Manual (static) HINT: Use NetIPAddress resource (see above). DHCP is not suitable for a Domain Controller., but got Dhcp.

test-case.description: Internal NIC IPv4 address matches AllNodes
test-case.name: Pre-DC Readiness (Dual NIC) - localhost.Internal NIC IPv4 address matches AllNodes

failure.message: Expected strings to be the same, because Internal NIC IP doesn't match configuration! Expected (from AllNodes.psd1): 192.168.99.10 Actual (from system): 10.0.2.15 HINT: Update your NetIPAddress resource or fix the value in AllNodes.psd1, but they were different. Expected length: 13 Actual length: 9 Strings differ at index 1. Expected: '192.168.99.10' But was: '10.0.2.15' -^

test-case.description: Internal NIC prefix length matches AllNodes
test-case.name: Pre-DC Readiness (Dual NIC) - localhost.Internal NIC prefix length matches AllNodes

test-case.description: Internal NIC has NO default gateway (single-gateway rule)
test-case.name: Pre-DC Readiness (Dual NIC) - localhost.Internal NIC has NO default gateway (single-gateway rule)

failure.message: Expected $null or empty, because Internal NIC should NOT have a default gateway (dual-NIC routing rule)! WHY: Only ONE NIC should have a gateway to avoid routing conflicts. The NAT/External NIC handles internet routing. HINT: Remove default gateway from internal adapter: Remove-NetRoute -InterfaceAlias 'Ethernet' -DestinationPrefix '0.0.0.0/0' -Confirm:$false Or ensure your NetIPAddress resource doesn't set DefaultGateway for internal NIC., but got MSFT_NetRoute (InstanceID = ":8:8:8:9:55;:55;:8:8?8?55;").

test-case.description: NAT NIC has a default gateway
test-case.name: Pre-DC Readiness (Dual NIC) - localhost.NAT NIC has a default gateway

failure.message: PropertyNotFoundException: The property 'IPv4DefaultGateway' cannot be found on this object. Verify that the property exists.

test-case.description: Internal NIC DNS servers match AllNodes (order-insensitive)
test-case.name: Pre-DC Readiness (Dual NIC) - localhost.Internal NIC DNS servers match AllNodes (order-insensitive)

failure.message: ParameterBindingException: Parameter set cannot be resolved using the specified named parameters. One or more parameters issued cannot be used together or an insufficient number of parameters were provided.

test-case.description: NAT NIC does not register in DNS when DisableDnsRegistrationOnNat is true
test-case.name: Pre-DC Readiness (Dual NIC) - localhost.NAT NIC does not register in DNS when DisableDnsRegistrationOnNat is true

failure.message: PropertyNotFoundException: The property 'RegisterThisConnectionsAddress' cannot be found on this object. Verify that the property exists.

test-case.name: Pre-DC Readiness (Dual NIC) - localhost.Internal NIC registers in DNS

failure.message: PropertyNotFoundException: The property 'IPv4Address' cannot be found on this object. Verify that the property exists.

failure.message: PropertyNotFoundException: The property 'Installed' cannot be found on this object. Verify that the property exists.

failure.message: PropertyNotFoundException: The property 'Installed' cannot be found on this object. Verify that the property exists.
